subject: [sugar] Missing or broken license headers
body:
Hello,

I wrote a quick script to detect missing or broken (GPL instead of LGPL) 
license headers.

Please fix the files you own the copyright for. Templates are in 
sugar/doc. Also please report problems with the script if you find any.

(The script is pretty generic btw, if you want to use it for other modules)

Thanks,
Marco

[marco@localhost sugar]$ ./maint-helper.py check-licenses
